channel.title: Paris Jackson on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Paris Jackson on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Paris Jackson Slams Colman Domingo for Saying She’s “in Support” of Michael Jackson Biopic: “I Wasn’t Involved at All”
item.description: “[Colman Domingo], don’t be telling people I was “helpful” on the set of a movie I had zero percent involvement in lol that is so weird,” the daughter of the King of Pop wrote on Instagram.

item.title: Paris Jackson Slams Colman Domingo for Saying She’s “in Support” of Michael Jackson Biopic: “I Wasn’t Involved at All”

item.title: Nick Hexum and Paris Jackson to Be Honored at Friendly House’s 35th Annual Awards Luncheon (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Friendly House— the non-profit organization committed to mental health and substance abuse recovery for women— will honor four prominent guests with special awards at its 35th Annual Awards Luncheon o
